title: Donnalee and Ivan reveal their baby's gender
text:
Donnalee and Ivan reveal their baby's gender share this

Cape Town - Donnalee Roberts and Ivan Botha are expecting their first child together.

The couple, who tied the knot in May, first shared their pregnancy with Sarie in September.

In an increasingly popular trend, Donnalee and Ivan marked the impending arrival of their newborn with a "babymoon" in Rome later that month.

Sharing a clip from the examination room on Instagram, during the ultrasound, Donnalee wrote: "Never in my entire life have I ever felt a love this big."

With the same clip, Ivan revealed the gender of the baby: "Can't wait to meet you my boy."

Messages of congratulations have flooded the actors' comment section, including words from Melinda Bam, Marciel Hopkins, Armand Aucamp and Mishka Patel.
